alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:24PM CDT until May 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Southeastern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... Northeastern Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Spiro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Pocola... Spiro... Hackett... Bonanza... Gans... Cameron... Jenny Lind... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Braden... Rye Hill... Jenson... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 13 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
